Squared Error

Source: R/metrics_point_forecasts.R
squared_error.Rd

Squared Error SE calculated as

$$ (\textrm{true\_values} - \textrm{predicted\_values})^2 $$

Usage

squared_error(true_values, predictions)

Arguments

true_values

A vector with the true observed values of size n

predictions

A vector with predicted values of size n

Value

vector with the scoring values

Examples

true_values <- rnorm(30, mean = 1:30)
predicted_values <- rnorm(30, mean = 1:30)
squared_error(true_values, predicted_values)
#>  [1] 2.715525e+00 1.458810e+00 4.487503e-01 3.249437e-02 1.616848e+00
#>  [6] 5.937377e-04 3.052154e-01 9.396199e-01 6.880077e-01 2.312969e+00
#> [11] 6.173136e-03 1.082890e-01 2.818088e-01 2.950909e+00 5.052315e-01
#> [16] 1.741787e-01 1.427372e+01 1.032612e-01 6.114473e-03 1.027019e+01
#> [21] 5.245291e+00 1.383842e-01 2.372674e-01 8.121187e-02 1.846246e-02
#> [26] 2.429880e+00 2.927056e+00 2.654857e-02 5.269238e+00 5.242922e-02
